img_text: DEAR WHITE HATERS electricity , antibiotics & modern medicine . toilets and water treatment . the printing press the internet , the automobile , the microscope the satellite, GPS, rocketry . skyscrapers refrigeration photography the internal combustion engine , space travel e eyeglasses plastics e wireless technology . the computer you use to bash white people in the societies they built YOU NEED US.WE DON'T NEED YOU
